title: How I Implemented Light/Dark Mode
content: To add light/dark mode, I created a toggle button that switches a class on the body. I also saved the user's preference in localStorage so it remembers their choice.

title: Building a Dynamic Blog with JavaScript
content: I used JavaScript's fetch() to load blog posts from a JSON file and inject them into the DOM. This saves time compared to hardcoding each post in HTML.

title: What I Learned from Assignment 2
content: This assignment helped me understand DOM manipulation, JSON, and how to make websites dynamic using JavaScript. I now feel more confident creating interactive web pages!
